# upstream

**Instance Property**

The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.

## Declaration

```swift
let upstream: Upstream
```

## Inspecting publisher properties

- **other**: Another publisher, whose first output causes this publisher to finish.

items.description: Another publisher, whose first output causes this publisher to finish.
